title: The Sanity Question

elliot_state.temporal_awareness: Questioning if experiences are real or psychotic delusion

key_realizations: Impossible to objectively verify if experiences are real or delusional

Must test prediction to verify quantum entanglement vs pattern recognition
Sanity becomes questionable even if experiences are real

key_quotes: We need to discuss the possibility that you're having a psychotic break.
That's either brilliant quantum reasoning or your delusion rationalizing why we shouldn't treat your breakdown.
